title: SOLD: T207 Nixey Callahan raw for sale

posts.post_title: SOLD: T207 Nixey Callahan raw for sale
posts.post_content:
SOLD
Pitched the first no-hitter in AL history! Card is in very nice shape.  OC top to bottom, top right corner a bit bent, and some scratching near "Amer" in the bottom frame, and the obvious ink spec on his nose.

$45- shipped domestically

I'm also working on this set so if you have any T207s to trade or sell, I'd love to see them.
